price: ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߘߞߐ߬ߣߐ߲߬ߠߌ߲ ߞߍ߫ ߞߍ߬ ߸ ߒߠߋ ߝߣߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߘߞߐ߬ߣߐ߲߬ߠߌ߲߬ߠߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߝߍ߬
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
